item.title: RuneScape or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

While, combat is a big part of it…you can’t say it is boring combat wise, since the large variety of skills to use in combat… You take rs for example, you get what? Slash, lunge, Defend… I don’t even remember the rest to be honest. Though, WoW just offers so many options, and skills when it comes to combat, that it is just plain fun.

Though I respect your opinion on the game, and that’s all it comes down to… is ones opinion, though I don’t think there would be 12million current paying subscribers if the game were boring. My opinion on runescape is that it is horribly boring, and that’s why people result to botting, and horrible management of this game destroys it to a point where it is plain stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:19, topic:417137”]world of warcraft… alot of people that go from runescape to wow , don’t even take a minute to look at what it is actually offering… & just jump into conclusions, like “its a massive combat grind blablabla”…

There is like 12 professions, which are actually interesting and have a point to getting… take engineering for example, and being able to make mounts… flying machines, motorbikes, etc… Here’s a pic of a copter you can make at a certain level with engineering…

It offers 3 expansion packs, all great fun. The raiding in it is incredible, the fights take an immense amount of skill, and are not plain stupid like runescapes… (stand and hit), World of warcraft has so many mechanics into its fights, it actually is a challenge and you dieing in let’s say a 25-man dungeon, can be the cause of the whole raid failing, at times. So everyone needs to be concentrating… and downing bosses are very rewarding… Here’s a picture of a very intense fight, which I recently completed with my guild…

f516cb62-46e4-48fe-97d5-d245c77b467b.jpg1024×768

Over 100+ dungeons to do in-game, and tonnes of quest… and for all those who say the quest are all just kill and collect… well, the quest were rewritten in the newest expansion ( all of them, pretty much)

Lots of classes, and races, all individual starting areas, and amazing lore behind everything. I really think all you rs players should really stop giving this game shit… give it a actual go, and then you’ll understand while there’s 12million current subscribers (which are actually paying for it , at this time)

… so yes, my answer is WoW…simply because of the amount of content it offers, The world is MASSIVE, i can’t express it. Though when guild wars 2 comes out, it will murder all the current mmos, even wow.[/quote]Protip: The world is tiny and you talk like someone who hasn’t played the previous sandbox generation of mmo’s at all. It doesn’t matter how much shit you put on top trying to hide the grind, it’s still a massive grindfest and a linear gay progression system where your goal is to hit max level.

Even ignoring this, it all boils down to combat. combat, combat combat. The so called professions are quite possibly even more linear than the actual main gameplay, and gives you little creativity or incentive to do anything.

Read full topic

@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

As a Lead designer for a game, probably WoW. Because I’d be working for the same company that makes Diablo 3

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

world of warcraft… alot of people that go from runescape to wow , don’t even take a minute to look at what it is actually offering… & just jump into conclusions, like “its a massive combat grind blablabla”…

There is like 12 professions, which are actually interesting and have a point to getting… take engineering for example, and being able to make mounts… flying machines, motorbikes, etc… Here’s a pic of a copter you can make at a certain level with engineering…

It offers 3 expansion packs, all great fun. The raiding in it is incredible, the fights take an immense amount of skill, and are not plain stupid like runescapes… (stand and hit), World of warcraft has so many mechanics into its fights, it actually is a challenge and you dieing in let’s say a 25-man dungeon, can be the cause of the whole raid failing, at times. So everyone needs to be concentrating… and downing bosses are very rewarding… Here’s a picture of a very intense fight, which I recently completed with my guild…

f516cb62-46e4-48fe-97d5-d245c77b467b.jpg1024×768

Over 100+ dungeons to do in-game, and tonnes of quest… and for all those who say the quest are all just kill and collect… well, the quest were rewritten in the newest expansion ( all of them, pretty much)

Lots of classes, and races, all individual starting areas, and amazing lore behind everything. I really think all you rs players should really stop giving this game shit… give it a actual go, and then you’ll understand while there’s 12million current subscribers (which are actually paying for it , at this time)

… so yes, my answer is WoW…simply because of the amount of content it offers, The world is MASSIVE, i can’t express it. Though when guild wars 2 comes out, it will murder all the current mmos, even wow.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape or WoW?
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:7, topic:417137”]Whichever has a higher income[/quote]Clearly world of warcraft has more income 10 Million + Online Daily gamecards cost 15$ using credit card online and 30$ in game stores despite having to pay to even get the game + extentions.

I’d choose world of warcraft I think it’s better in general runescape has gone completely off the tracks.

Read full topic
